text: "Self Esteem" is a song by the Californian punk rock group The Offspring. It was the second single from the album Smash (1994). It was also the first major single to be released by the band. The song was a worldwide hit, reaching #1 in Latvia, Norway, and Sweden and was one of the most successful singles released by the band. However, according to frontman Dexter Holland, the song has not been very popular in Japan.Complete Music Video Collection DVD ==References== Category:The Offspring songs Category:1994 songs
title: Self Esteem
